title: The Selkie Wife
description: **"The Selkie Wife" is a fanfiction story based on the fairy tale of the same name.**Set during the reign of "Bloody Mary" Tudor. Bella is a selkie captured by Edward to raise his daughter. He promises to release her one day, but will he? Court intrigues and danger around every corner. Can they, and their new-found love, survive?
author: Lissa Bryan
